html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02702024-03-25PSPC, TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOld Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. & Parc Downsview Park Inc. ** Lease **
PrecisOrder (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2024-25, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2024-25 to 2028-29 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2024-25, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2024-25 to 2028-28 planning period.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2024-25, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2024-25 to 2028-29 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to enter into up to 30 leases in 2024-25, and to retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2024-25 to 2028-28 planning period.
